title: I can't log into my account
body: I can't log into my account because it says that my account is being transferred to another region even though i never asked for my account to be transferred. and this is my second account and the account i am having trouble with is has the summoner name of borky99

replies.body: If your account is performing an unauthorized transfer, reach out to our account recovery team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll work with you individually to see what's going on and help towards restoring your account.  We'll reply as soon as we can, but in the meantime I recommend running through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info is secure in and outside of league.  Don't worry!
